function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High transmissibility of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus leading to an increase in COVID-19 cases and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and lockdowns, promote vaccination and mask-wearing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, ventilation systems, rapid testing technologies","People":"General population, healthcare workers, elderly and immunocompromised individuals","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Undesirable effects of prolonged quarantine","Impact":"Psychological effects such as post-traumatic stress symptoms, confusion, and anxiety, as well as adverse health changes such as premature ageing, obesity, cardiovascular vulnerability, muscle atrophy, and decreased aerobic capacity","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support, promoting physical activity, and encouraging social support networks","Technologies":"Telehealth and mental health apps, remote exercise programs, virtual social interaction platforms","People":"Individuals in quarantine, especially those with pre-existing mental health conditions or chronic diseases","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals, community organizations"},{"Description":"Long-term detraining due to forced stop of physical activity","Impact":"Marked decline in maximal oxygen consumption (VO2max), reduced endurance capacity, loss of muscle strength and mass, tendon ruptures, and reduced joint tribology","Mitigation":"Encouraging safe physical activity at home, providing remote training programs, and promoting gradual return to exercise","Technologies":"Fitness tracking apps, home exercise equipment, virtual personal training sessions","People":"General population, particularly those who had to stop regular physical activity due to quarantine measures","Owner":"Fitness and wellness organizations, healthcare providers, public health authorities"}]}
